Awesome boat! I have a 16 Sylvan with a 40, but something like yours is the next one
Careful with Ernie! didnt know Limber tail was a thing until I saw my buddies dog get it in the spring. It was clearly very uncomfortable for the dog and took a few days to go away!

BOQ yesterday, 51 deg inner bay, 48 deg out on the reach. Fishing totally sucked, only heard of 4 'eyes being caught.Â  There were a fair amount of boats out as a lot of waterfront properties have their own launch.Â  OPP stopped us 2x, once in Hay Bay, 2nd time in the reach.
My Yami F115 loves those cold water temps.Â  Best mileage of the season.
What a difference a week makes. Water 50F last week. Today 70F thisÂ Â afternoon. Â  Almost swimmable. ðŸ¤ª
Water's still 32 here. Shorelines will start going this week though and the small pot hole lakes should open up.

we were swimming in the lake Friday, was pretty comfortable actually (even I had to go in to deal with a dock issue). Having said that, our lake is only 7-10 feet in most spots. Saw tons of bass in the shallows gettin busy...love this time of year!

thats what i heard, huge schools of fish over the weekend on the tri lakes all in <4fow. love is in the air! or the water lol I dealt with my dock issues 2 weeks ago...wasnt so fun lol We have a dry suit thank god, but after 10 hours of diving down 8 feet to hook into chains in 40 something degree water I was over it lol
